title: Decay particles - compare positron and gamma mass

content.question: Which of the following correctly compares the masses <math alttext="m sub positron" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>m</mi><mtext>positron</mtext></msub></math> and <math alttext="m sub gamma" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>m</mi><mtext>gamma</mtext></msub></math> of a positron and a gamma-ray photon, respectively?

choices.label: <math alttext="m sub positron, end sub, is greater than, m sub gamma, end sub, which equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>m</mi><mtext>positron</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>m</mi><mtext>gamma</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>

<math alttext="m sub positron, end sub, is greater than, m sub gamma, end sub, which is greater than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>m</mi><mtext>positron</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>m</mi><mtext>gamma</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></math>

<math alttext="m sub gamma, end sub, is greater than, m sub positron, end sub, which equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>m</mi><mtext>gamma</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>m</mi><mtext>positron</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>

<math alttext="m sub gamma, end sub, is greater than, m sub positron, end sub, which is greater than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>m</mi><mtext>gamma</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>m</mi><mtext>positron</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="m sub positron, end sub, is greater than, m sub gamma, end sub, which equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>m</mi><mtext>positron</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>m</mi><mtext>gamma</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
